page.title: 03Education-Grundisburgh
page.content: State education: Provided in Suffolk from 5 - 16. There is a provision for the accommodation of "rising fives". The village school has an age range of 5 - 10; this is at present subject to a review which may change both its age range and the subsequent provision of education for the children. a "Middle School/High School" system operates but this is subject to change. Playgroup:Operates in the village with full liaison between school and group. Private Education:Facilities available in Woodbridge,5kms, and Ipswich,10kms. Youth Training: Schemes available. Evening Classes: Available in nearby towns and provided by some local clubs. Further Education: College of Higher Education, Ipswich, 10 kms, University of East Anglia, Norwich, 70 kms. Science/Technology: Integration of use of Computer throughout school.
